contentList.content: Your self-discipline and martial training allow you to harness a well of extraordinary energy within yourself. You can spend <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">these points</LSTag> to fuel advanced monk techniques.

You start knowing three such features: <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Target_OneDnD_FlurryOfBlows_FirstStrike">Flurry of Blows</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Shout_OneDnD_PatientDefense">Patient Defense</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="CL_Shout_OneDnD_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind</LSTag>.
Your self-discipline and martial training allow you to harness a well of extraordinary energy within yourself. You can spend Discipline Points to fuel advanced monk techniques.
You gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Discipline Point</LSTag> to fuel your monk techniques.
Make two Unarmed Strikes as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">bonus action</LSTag>.
Flurry of Blows: Follow Up Strike
Follow up with another Unarmed Strike.

Focusing on avoiding attacks.

Can move without provoking Opportunity Attacks. Attack Rolls against the affected entity have Disadvantage, and the entity has Advantage on Dexterity Saving Throws.

Focusing on speed.

Movement speed is doubled. Can move without provoking Opportunity Attacks. Jump no longer requires a bonus action and the distance is doubled.
